gameelements
Class Game

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      gameelements.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConsoleGame
public class Game
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.lang.Runnable

Represents a running game, containing the game board, the game situation, and the two players and manages each turn by asking the current player for its next move and applying it to the game, until the game is stopped or the game is won by one player.

Field Summary

          The current game board of the game.
protected  Position latestMove
          The latest move that has been placed by any player in the game.

          This is the black (second) player.

protected  void processTurn()
          Switches active player on every turn, asks current player for next move, proceeds with move and counts up the turn number.
